thread.section_title: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sama5459
title: Great hotel
text:
It was second visit from Paris for me and my husband and the first time for this hotel .
It has a great location in the center of Paris. The nearest metro station about 5 minutes by walk and also the Champ Ellysee avenue in 2 minutes by walk.
As We stayed in this hotel in Christmas time , it was an advantage for us to go to Christmas Marek by walk easy.
Breakfast was awesome and also we had free snack bar from 2pm to 1 am.
I highly recommend this hotel and I absolutely go there again.
